titles.title: Tax Equity Act of 1993
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide for adjustments in the individual income tax rates to reflect regional differences in the cost-of-living.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E1101)
Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 4/29/1993--Introduced. Tax Equity Act of 1993 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide for regional cost-of-living adjustments in individual income tax rates.
